sqlMap.select:
SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
MNID = #mnid#
PROCID = #procid#
PORTID = #portid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
STATUS = #status#
$orderBy$
SITEID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", PORTID as "portid" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
PORTID = #procid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
ISONLINE = #isonline#
CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
MNID = #mnid#
DESCRIPTION = #description#
SORT = #sort#
STATUS = #status#
CREATOR = #creator#
CREATED_TIME = #createdTime#
MODIFIER = #modifier#
UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime#

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE order by SITEID desc fetch first 1 rows only

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.SITENAME as "sitename", t1.DEPARTID as "departid", t4.DEPARTMENT_NAME as "departname", t1.PROCID as "procid", t3.DEPARTMENT_NAME as "procname", t1.PORTID as "portid", t2.DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "portname", t2.DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", t1.ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", t1.ISONLINE as "isonline", t1.CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.MNID as "mnid", t1.DESCRIPTION as "description", t1.SORT as "sort", t1.STATUS as "status", t1.CREATOR as "creator", t1.CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", t1.MODIFIER as "modifier", t1.UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" , t5.useflag as "useflag" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t1 left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT t2 on t1.PORTID = t2.DISCHARGEPORTID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DEPARTMENT t3 on t3.DEPARTMENT_ID = t2.PROCID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DEPARTMENT t4 on t4.DEPARTMENT_ID = t2.DEPARTID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE_EX t5 on t1.mnid=t5.mnid
WHERE 1=1
t1.SITEID = #siteid#
t1.PROCID = #procid#
t1.PORTID = #portid#
t2.DEPARTID = #departid#
t1.ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
t1.ISONLINE = #isonline#
t1.STATUS = #status#
t1.CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
t1.MONITORID = #monitorid#
t1.SITENAME like '%$sitename$%'
t2.countrypoint = #countrypoint#
t2.citypoint = #citypoint#
t2.companypoint = #companypoint#
$orderBy$
t1.SITEID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
ISONLINE = #isonline#
STATUS = #status#
CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
$orderBy$
CAST(SORT as INT) asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
ISONLINE = #isonline#
STATUS = #status#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
PROCID = #procid#
$orderBy$
SITEID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
PROCID = #procid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
$orderBy$
SITEID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SORT = #sort#
$orderBy$
SITEID asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
CAST(SORT as INT) >= #sort#
$orderBy$
SORT asc

SELECT SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", PORTID as "portid", ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", ISONLINE as "isonline", CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", MONITORID as "monitorid", MNID as "mnid", DESCRIPTION as "description", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE order by CAST(SORT as INT) desc fetch first 1 rows only

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE WHERE 1=1
SITEID = #siteid#
PORTID = #portid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
ISONLINE = #isonline#
STATUS = #status#
CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE (SITEID, SITENAME, DEPARTID, PROCID, PORTID, ISARTIFICIAL, ISONLINE, CLASSIFYID, MONITORID, MNID, DESCRIPTION, SORT, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED_TIME ) VALUES (#siteid:VARCHAR#, #sitename:VARCHAR#, #departid:VARCHAR#, #procid:VARCHAR#, #portid:VARCHAR#, #isartificial:VARCHAR#, #isonline:VARCHAR#, #classifyid:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #mnid:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #sort:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #creator:VARCHAR#, #createdTime:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET SITENAME = #sitename#, DEPARTID = #departid#, PROCID = #procid#, PORTID = #portid#, ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#, ISONLINE = #isonline#, CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, MNID = #mnid#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, SORT = #sort#, STATUS = #status#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE SITEID = #siteid#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET SITENAME = #sitename#, DEPARTID = #departid#, PROCID = #procid#, PORTID = #portid#, ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#, ISONLINE = #isonline#, CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, MNID = #mnid#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, STATUS = #status#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE SITEID = #siteid#
UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET PORTID = #portid#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime# WHERE SITEID = #siteid#
UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET SORT = CAST(SORT as INT) + 1 WHERE CAST(SORT as INT) < #sortOld# AND CAST(SORT as INT) >= #sortNew#
UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET SORT = CAST(SORT as INT) - 1 WHERE CAST(SORT as INT) > #sortOld# AND CAST(SORT as INT) <= #sortNew#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE SET DEPARTID = #departid#, PROCID = #procid#
WHERE PORTID = #portid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t1.STATUS = '1'
t1.CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
t1.ISONLINE = #isonline#
t1.ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = '1'
MONITORID = #monitorid#
ISFORMAL = #isformal#
DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY != #dischargeClassify#

SELECT t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.SITENAME as "sitename", t1.DEPARTID as "departid", t4.DEPARTMENT_NAME as "departname", t1.PROCID as "procid", t3.DEPARTMENT_NAME as "procname", t1.PORTID as "portid", t2.DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "portname", t2.DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", t1.ISARTIFICIAL as "isartificial", t1.ISONLINE as "isonline", t1.CLASSIFYID as "classifyid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.MNID as "mnid", t1.DESCRIPTION as "description", t1.SORT as "sort", t1.STATUS as "status", t1.CREATOR as "creator", t1.CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", t1.MODIFIER as "modifier", t1.UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" , t5.useflag as "useflag" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t1 left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT t2 on t1.PORTID = t2.DISCHARGEPORTID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DEPARTMENT t3 on t3.DEPARTMENT_ID = t2.PROCID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DEPARTMENT t4 on t4.DEPARTMENT_ID = t2.DEPARTID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE_EX t5 on t1.mnid=t5.mnid WHERE 1 = 1 AND t1.STATUS = '1'
t1.CLASSIFYID = #classifyid#
t1.ISONLINE = #isonline#
t1.ISARTIFICIAL = #isartificial#
